Vocabulary Builder Pro

- Single-file HTML app with embedded CSS and JavaScript; no external dependencies
- Core purpose: interactive vocabulary learning tool with spaced repetition and progress tracking
- Features:
  - Create custom word lists (word, definition, example sentence, difficulty level 1-5)
  - Quiz modes: multiple choice (4 options), flashcard (reveal definition), and fill-in-the-blank
  - Spaced repetition algorithm: words due for review appear more frequently based on last correct answer date
  - Progress dashboard: total words, mastery percentage, streak counter, words by difficulty
  - Responsive grid layout (mobile, tablet, desktop) using CSS Grid and Flexbox
  - Dark/light theme toggle with localStorage persistence
  - All data persists in browser localStorage as JSON
- Accessibility & keyboard support:
  - Full keyboard navigation (Tab, Enter, Arrow keys for quiz selection)
  - ARIA labels on all interactive elements
  - Semantic HTML structure
  - Focus indicators visible on all buttons
- Undo/redo functionality: 10-step history for word additions/edits/deletions within current session
- Quiz performance tracking: records accuracy per word, calculates retention percentage
- Import/export: download word lists as JSON file, paste JSON to restore
- No external libraries, standard browser APIs only
